title: Galateo of Maister Iohn Della Casa, Archebishop of Beneuenta. Or rather, A treatise of the ma[n]ners and behauiours, it behoueth a man to vse and eschewe, in his familiar conuersation A worke very necessary & profitable for all gentlemen, or other. First written in the Italian tongue, and now done into English by Robert Peterson, of Lincolnes Inne Gentleman.
author: Della Casa, Giovanni, 1503-1556.
publisher: [By Henry Middleton] for Raufe Newbery dwelling in Fleetestreate a litle aboue the Conduit,
notes: Running title reads: Galateo, of manners and behauiour.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
